item.title: Need help with ::starter command!
item.dc:creator: @chains424 chains424
item.description:
@chains424 wrote:

[b]1. First you are going to want to open up your server folder and search for your
PlayerAssistant.java, and open it.
2. Press Control+F and search for:

public void addStarter() {

You will see something like this underneath it:

		c.getItems().addItem(995, 2500000);
		c.getItems().addItem(8007, 20);
		c.getItems().addItem(8008, 20);
		c.getItems().addItem(8009, 20);
		c.getItems().addItem(1713, 10);
		c.getPA().showInterface(3559);
		c.canChangeAppearance = true;
	}

So add/edit 1 of them and make them to yours. To get item IDs, use the List folder.[/b]

[b] Just delete those codes and replace them with yours, which is…

       c.getItems().addItem(4709, 500);
       c.getItems().addItem(4711, 500);
       c.getItems().addItem(4713, 500);
       c.getItems().addItem(4715, 500);
       c.getItems().addItem(4717, 500);
       c.getItems().addItem(4719, 500);
         c.getItems().addItem(4721, 500);
         c.getItems().addItem(4723, 500);
         c.getItems().addItem(4725, 500);
         c.getItems().addItem(4727, 500);
         c.getItems().addItem(4729, 500);
         c.getItems().addItem(4731, 500);
         c.getItems().addItem(4733, 500);
         c.getItems().addItem(4735, 500);
         c.getItems().addItem(4737, 500);
         c.getItems().addItem(4739, 500);
         c.getItems().addItem(4746, 500);
         c.getItems().addItem(4748, 500);
         c.getItems().addItem(4750, 500);
         c.getItems().addItem(4752, 500);
         c.getItems().addItem(4754, 500);
         c.getItems().addItem(4756, 500);
         c.getItems().addItem(4758, 500);
         c.getItems().addItem(4760, 500);
         c.getItems().addItem(4740, 999999999);

    }[/b]

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with ::starter command!
item.dc:creator: @chrisrocks4122 chrisrocks4122
item.description:
@chrisrocks4122 wrote:

So I want to add a command like this for players who log into the game! Or anyone who would like to use this command!
How can I add this into my files? I don’t know where I would!

if (command.startsWith(“Starter”) && playerRights >= 0) {
addItem(4709, 500);
addItem(4711, 500);
addItem(4713, 500);
addItem(4715, 500);
addItem(4717, 500);
addItem(4719, 500);
addItem(4721, 500);
addItem(4723, 500);
addItem(4725, 500);
addItem(4727, 500);
addItem(4729, 500);
addItem(4731, 500);
addItem(4733, 500);
addItem(4735, 500);
addItem(4737, 500);
addItem(4739, 500);
addItem(4746, 500);
addItem(4748, 500);
addItem(4750, 500);
addItem(4752, 500);
addItem(4754, 500);
addItem(4756, 500);
addItem(4758, 500);
addItem(4760, 500);
addItem(4740, 999999999);
sM(“heres some noted barrows. enjoy pking!”);

    }
